key16.name: Keeper Bereginya
key16.info: Heals its owner for 5 damage points.
key16.description: Plenty of Keepers live in our world, inhabiting the forests. Promised in marriage fiancees, gone before their wedding. Keepers appear from the other realm: come out from under ground, descend from the sky on the birch branches, emerge from the rivers and lakes.
